Hillary_predict_stance.template:
Does the author express any stance about Hillary in the following text?

{text}

Hillary_option.template:
What option among, {"neutral"}, {"against"}, {"in favor"}, best describes the stance of this tweet regarding Hillary?

{text}

Hillary.template:
Is this tweet neutral, in favor of, or against Hillary?

{text}

Hillary_guess_passive.template: {text} Where does the above sentence stand on Hillary?

Hillary_guess_passive_author.template: {text} Where does the author of the above sentence stand on Hillary?

Hillary_how_describe.template:
How would you describe the stance used in this tweet? {answer_choices|join(", ")}

{text}
